name: Arcane Blink
description: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.

abilities.name: Arcane Blink
abilities.description: Instantly teleports the wielder towards the targeted point. After the teleportation, heals and replenishes the caster's health and mana.
notes: When targeting a point within 1400 distance, teleports directly onto the targeted point
When targeting a point beyond 1400 distance, teleports 1400 distance towards the targeted point instead
Incoming projectiles are disjointed upon teleporting
Taking more than 0 damage from any other player or Roshan (after reductions and not flagged as HP Removal) puts the item on a fixed cooldown
Cannot be reset with cooldown reset sources
Doubletap targets a point in front of the team's Fountain
Shares cooldown with Blink Dagger, Overwhelming Blink, Swift Blink, and Arcane Blink

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 300 mana, 1.25 mana regeneration and 2.5% flat base magic resistance
25 main attack damage to Intelligence heroes
11.25 main attack damage to Universal heroes
